Title: After Yang
Premise: In a near future, a family reckons with questions of love, connection, and loss after their A.I. helper unexpectedly breaks down.

Title: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent
Premise: In this action-packed comedy, Nicolas Cage plays Nick Cage, channeling his iconic characters as he's caught between a superfan and a CIA agent.

Title: Enemy
Premise: A man seeks out his exact look-alike after spotting him in a movie.

Title: Wild at Heart
Premise: Young lovers Sailor and Lula run from the variety of weirdos that Lula's mom has hired to kill Sailor.

Title: The House That Jack Built
Premise: The story follows Jack, a highly intelligent serial killer, over the course of twelve years, and depicts the murders that really develop his inner madman.
